class_notes:
(Same as AAS 285 4 and WGS 285 2)


MCP Elective
course_description: This course will pair a wide range of film/tv and social media texts that mis/represent Black girls/femmes, with the theoretical work that examines the complexities and intersections of race, personhood, sexuality, and authority. Course culminates in a creative final project. Weekly screenings required.
prerequisites: FILM 101 or FILM_OX 101 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 4104, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 2:30-6:30p, Instructor: D. Rogers, Status: Open
